pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Highfrequency Data Analysis // Provide functionality to manage, clean and match highfrequency trades and quotes data, calculate various liquidity measures, estimate and forecast volatility, detect price jumps and investigate microstructure noise and intraday periodicity. A detailed vignette can be found in the paper "Analyzing intraday financial data in R: The highfrequency package" by Boudt, Kleen, and Sjoerup (2022, doi:10.2139/ssrn.3917548).
